title: 3 bugs relating to pulsefire ez on howling abyss (ARAM)
body:
was playing aram and had a pulsefire ez on team and as you can see on attached screenshot
1) shows up as a white box on minimap
2) champ name not shown next to player name (ignore my launcher language being korean)
3) when sona killed ez it showed 'sona(image) has killed sona(image)' (not shown on screenshot)

replies.body:
Pulsefire Ezreal has apparently been disabled since 11 this morning yet, according to OP.GG, that match took place not so long ago. The hell Rito?

> Network Operations â€“ 11:04 AM
Dragon Trainer Lulu, Winter Wonder Lulu, Arclight Vel'Koz, **Pulsefire Ezreal** and Triumphant Ryze are temporarily disabled while we work on fixing a bug with the skins.

Source: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
didnt even realise PF ez was disabled :S
